data.title: Peter Schube Bio
data.meta_description: Peter Schube Board President Emeritus, Founder, Ladder & Light, Inc.Peter Schube began his one-year term as HOLA’s Board President in June 2016. data.text: Peter Schube began his one-year term as HOLA’s Board President in June 2016. Peter has served on HOLA’s Board of Directors for more than eight years, and both he and his wife have been deeply involved and invested in HOLA for more than 12 years. Peter is currently the Founder of Ladder & Light, Inc. Previously, he was the Chief Operating Officer for Illumination Entertainment and is an active member of the Jim Henson Company’s Board of Directors, where he served as their President and COO for the last 12 years of his 28-year tenure with the company. Peter was also an attorney in private practice in New York and received degrees in History and English from Wesleyan University and a Juris Doctor from New York University Law School.
